text: [upbeat music]

NARRATOR: Get ready for
a story about Disney's
greatest villains' kids!

(SINGING) Meet Mal and
Evie, Carlos, and Jay

Four naughty villain
kids exiled away

But then sweet Prince
Ben makes a new rule

Just these four villain (Just four!)
kids can come to school

Mal's mom, Maleficent,
wants Fairy Godmother's wand

To free the Isle of the
Lost and conquer Auradon

So Mal must get the wand
to help her mama scheme
Carlos befriends a dog

Jay joins the
magic lacrosse team
But Mal catches feels for Ben
So she can't steal the wand

But then Jane wants to use
magic to give herself a glow up
She steals the wand

Jane accidentally opens up
the villain island barrier

So then Maleficent shows up
and things get even scarier
But Mal defeats her dragon
Mom turns her into a lizard
Mal and Ben almost kiss

Just wait until the
sequel, sequel, sequel

There's a new
villain kid, name is Uma
That's her name

Just like the last movie
she wants that wand
Surprise

Meanwhile, Mal feels
weird as a princess

Go back to purple hair,
you're not a blonde
Uma snatches Ben
And demands the wand

So they try to outwit
her with a 3D printer
That's actually in the movie
There's a sword fight
And a sick rap battle

Then Ben falls in love
with Uma in her new getup
That sneaky Uma
Used a magic spell

But here's an art piece
Ben commissioned
Proof that he loves Mal
So Mal kisses Ben
Finally
Uma's love spell ends

Uma's angry so she
becomes an octopus
Then Mal becomes a dragon
Just like her mama
There's an octopus-dragon battle
It's mostly just splashing
Ben breaks up the battle
By going beast-mode like his dad
Mal and Ben get another smooch
Two kisses in one movie

Then there's another
sequel, sequel
Ben asks Mal if he can marry her

Hades nearly breaks
the villain barrier

Ben's exgirlfriend, Audrey,
gets really jealous,

Steals a crown and scepter
turns Mal into a hag
Ew
Mal meets Hades, gets his ember
So rad
Turns out he is a family member
Her dad, what

Audrey does a curse that
puts everyone to sleep

Ben says cut it out, so
she turns him into a beast
But Mal and Uma, do a team up
Yay
They beat a bunch of knights
Audrey freaks out

Evie wakes Doug with
true love's kiss

Carlos gets Jane a gift
using the 3D printer again
Callback

Uma's necklace
charges the Ember
Huh

Apparently, that
overpowers the scepter
Queen Mal and King Ben decree
All the exiled folks are free
Auradon's for everyone.
And with that, the story's done.

JK, there's a
sequel with Brandy.
